entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect trim analysis warning for base method implementing interface #97676
  • OrderByDescending(...).First() changed which item is getting returned #97668
  • TypeLoadException on minimal, correct and compiling program #97667
    8.0.x
  • Crash related to GC: help interpreting stacktrace #97661
  • [WASI] Best pattern for Native DLL Pinvokes using wasi workload? #97656
  • Flag stale PR validation builds #97653
  • [wasm][mt] Debugger test is using blocking calls in JS interop thread #97652
    9.0.0
  • Scalability of System.Text.Json #97649
  • Usersecrets in Docker container don't work when USER app set #97647
  • System.IO.Ports - SerialDataReceivedEventHandler not fired after device restart #97646
  • JIT: checked/release diffs #97638
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors tests timing out under DOTNET_JITMinOpts=1 on x86 #97629
    9.0.0
  • Unnecessary buffer allocations when writing base64 values with `Utf8JsonWriter`. #97628
    Future

Closed

  • Misinterpretation of VT_INT/UINT in new COM interop #97363
  • System.Text.Json source generators don't preserve nullability of object types in JsonSerializable attributes #97665
  • TE Plaintext regression on 80-cores Ampere #97659
  • JIT: LSRA loses track of anti-preferences #92586
    Future
  • SqlBytes.Stream should consider overriding Span Read/Write methods #69921
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses() returns truncated 15 char string on macOS #52860
    Future
  • Debugging Browser app fails with [object Object] error with Avalonia 11.0.7. #97663
  • DateTime.ParseExact in .NET8 on Linux fails to parse date strings which were parsed with .NET7 #97627
  • Mono Runtime Error in Blazor WASM App when using IL Weaving #97377
  • Property duplication on overriding property with [JsonPropertyName] #97648
  • System.Text.Json silent null on List<> when respecting CS8618 #97635
  • Directory.EnumerateFiles on Linux recurses infinitely with bad symlinks #97123
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'emitVerifyEncodable(ins, size, dstReg, srcReg)' during 'Generate code' #97587
    9.0.0
  • JsonDocument JsonSerializer.Deserialize does not match JsonDocument.Parse for null root elements #97323
    Future
  • [browser] InterpPgoTests.FirstRunGeneratesTableAndSecondRunLoadsIt #97597
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose span-based `char.[Try]Parse` publicly #97598

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: don't ask for all write barrer helpers for AOT #97677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add the barebones support for using embedded masking with AVX512 #97675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Unrestored/UnrestoredTypeKey flags #97674
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix stability of OrderByDescending.Last #97672
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: Remove optLoopCompactionFixupFallThrough #97670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove fgReplaceSwitchJumpTarget; increase usage of fgReplaceJumpTarget #97664
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Put scalar stack args with sign extension #97662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][llvm] Avoid linking a bblock ending with a NOT_REACHABLE with … #97660
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • For Debug, make sure we use right register selection heuristics to match with Release #97657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • adjust ownership of infrastructure-mono #97655
    area-Meta
  • reduce System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests noise in log files #97654
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser] improve behavior after exit, better docs #97651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97650
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_DA_4A to IF_SVE_DC_3A group #97645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add sudo to dmesg call in test run template #97624
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Pow, Exp2, Exp10, Cbrt #97623
    area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Clarify comments around VT_INT and VT_UINT #97671
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update CODEOWNERS #97673
    area-Meta
  • Switch WindowsSpecificBehavior host tests to pre-built assets #97586
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Split FeatureSwitchManager #97626
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace SPKI hashing with a managed implementation #97559
    area-System.Security
  • [NativeAOT] Remove dead ASM code #97636
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add missing space in PeriodicTimer.cs #97658
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Call String.Contains(char) from String.Contains(string) for single-char literals #97632
    area-System.Runtime
  • updating area ownership within mono and coreclr #97571
    area-Meta
  • Optimize BigInteger.CompareTo() #96835
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #2 #97480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize threshold of BigInteger.Parse #97101
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update "type-" to "type-safe" #97107
    documentation, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97553
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Replumb TensorPrimitives.ConvertToHalf/Single to be on operator plan #97608
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Remove most fgConnectFallThrough calls #97488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] send cancel to abandoned threads with event loop during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove some loop flags #97314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • handle null value when deserializing JsonDocument #97596
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix GT_XCHG for byte on x86 #97593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude tests for Apple platforms on hybrid mode #97550
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Format System.Runtime ref assembly sources #97609
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97613
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives shift and rotate operators #97361
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Update constant prop to only consider certain hwintrinsics #97616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] change the branch's disasm-format. #96229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ARM: Implement the EABI #97604
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize `optSetPreheaderWeight` #96843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize Interlocked.CompareExchange use in Task #93953
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default loop peeling phase #97517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test] test only #97614
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use DivRem in Decimal.DecCalc #97619
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Intermittent SIGSEGV in System.IO.FileSystem tests on macOS #1094

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for diffing LLVM bitcode to `wasmjit-diff.ps1` #2496
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not create useless 'alloca's for shadow locals #2495
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not spill nulls #2497
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add property to include libmscordbi.so, libmscordaccore.so, and createdump when publishing self-contained, single file applications #38343
  • Using "dotnet restore" on multiple projects at once. #38326
  • Different .NET 8 runtime behaviour based on different SDK used #38325
  • error MSB4062: The "Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.Tasks.ComputeDotnetBaselmageAndTag" task could not be loaded from the assembly C:\Users\x\.nuget\packages\microsoft.net.build.containers\8.0.101\build..'' and other errors #38330
  • `dotnet watch` silently fails to apply launch profiles when the `launchSettings.json` file contains JSON comments. #38323
  • CopyDebugSymbolFilesFromPackages does not copy pdbs from runtime dir #38322

Closed

  • dotnet-ef 8.0.1 fails to work on .NET 8.0.0 #38334
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC][Linux] With NET 9 alpha SDK installed, the maui-android workload manifest version should update to 9.0 after running ‘sudo dotnet workload update’ #37971

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Update to the Jan 8.0.1 released version of the runtime #38344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add 8.0.2xx and 8.0.3xx changelog files for containers tooling #38336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • IP: .NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set
  • Champion: Remove error "Cannot yield a value in the body of a try block with a catch clause" #2949
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Permit trailing commas in method signatures and invocations #391
    Backlog
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Extension lowering #7771
  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #7887
  • Adjust `params` type requirements based on recent LDM decisions (params-collections.md) #7879

Updated

  • Create spec for lambda params with modifiers without type name #7369

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • An error that a collection builder type is missing is not reported #71854
  • CSharpCompletionCommandHandlerTests.TestDeletingWholeWordResetCompletionToTheDefaultItem is flakey #71851
    17.10
  • IDE0052 Reported for Ref Field Assignment #71847
  • "Prefer namespace and folder match structure" in the wrong section in .editiorconfig UI #71845
  • Error message for invalid 'csharp_style_namespace_declarations' is unclear #71844
  • I`m having problems using Collection Expressions after the latest update of Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3 #71843
  • Completion tooltips stop working #71841

Closed

  • Analysis of C# projects in Docker does not contain ISymbols from libraries imported in using statements #71842
  • "ctor" semantic snippet generates Linux line endings on Windows machine/project #70685

PullRequests

Created

  • Reorder calls so we don't need to fetch something unchanged. #71859
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Share common code in compilation tracker #71858
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Correct show behavior in IntelliSense page. #71857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge pull request #71412 from vibeeshan025/main #71853
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForQB
  • Allow the Invert If refactor if the parent statement is a global one #71850
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Rename parameter for clarity #71849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing #71829
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Be consistent with pattern we use in code #71856
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure related docs in the preview workspace link to same sourcetext #71825
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Skip test #71852
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Msbuild downgrade #71848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Always return the same instance when asking for the same frozen doc snapshot from a solution. #71822
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Append chars more efficiently when creating strings #71812
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71860
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support implicit reference conversions with arrays #71836
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.2.0.7535 #71837
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use raw strings in tests #71834
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change an ApplyChangeToWorkspace overload to remove some async #71830
    Area-IDE
  • Suppress formatting with stackalloc array creations #59808
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #53696
  • Consider making `IdentityResult.Failed(List<IdentityError>? errors)` public #53693
  • Invalid Issuer should response 500 instead of 401 in dotnet 8 Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #53692
  • POST request returns error 400 (Bad Request) caused by CORS while fetching in JavaScript #53691
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #53684
  • There is a problem with transmitting and receiving url routing parameters #53683

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #53679
  • Blazor .net 8 Cannot access a disposed context instance #53450
  • .NET Blazor 8 Interactive Server Render Mode breaks Authentication #53686
  • Error : ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE On Blazor Project #53513
  • BasePath is not honoured when requesting/serving hot-reload scripts #53497
    .NET 9 Planning
  • #dotnet #blazor #filesUpload => crash when OnChange occured #53507
  • no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #53671
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.StaticFileMiddleware[16] The WebRootPath was not found: C:\Users\xxx\web\razorcli\wwwroot. Static files may be unavailable." displays after running razor.dll file in CLI. #53432
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53649
  • Unexpected exception: HRESULT 0x8007023e returned at D:\a\_work\1\s\src\Servers\IIS\AspNetCoreModuleV2\InProcessRequestHandler\inprocessapplication.cpp:268 #53036
  • Not all libraries are publishing a grpc server with mongodb when using the 'Trim unused code' option checked #53331
  • Error : Normalizing '_blazor' to ... in balzor .net 8 #53356
  • Using InputRadioGroup in a component does not generate a unique name #53413

PullRequests

Created

  • Update source index package version #53698
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix `CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton` #53697
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix lint warnings in README #53695
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix XML docs in EndpointFilterInvocationContext.cs #53655
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove comment about DotNet-Blob-Feed from ci.yml #53672
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove deprecated VS Code extension #53673
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24078.1 #53685
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Return unsuccessful when trying to read form and request does not have body #53680
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53642
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Fixes encoded `/` on Blazor Router #53538
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android Casting in .Net Maui 8 using Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Cast.Framework Does Not work #20233
  • CSC : warning CS8785: Generator 'CodeBehindGenerator' failed to generate source #20232
  • [iOS] Keyboard hides Entry on Grid #20231
  • [Windows] ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBounds fails with ContentView #20228
    Backlog
  • Add support for macOS native instead of Mac Catalyst #20225
  • CollectionView ItemTemplate OnSelectTemplate is not called when the ItemsSource is updated #20220
  • Can't use LinearGradientBrush as Button Background on iOS #20218
  • Grouped tab - search handler issue #20217

Closed

  • CollectionView sets the wrong height for items containing long word-wrapped text inside a * column #17050
  • GestureRecognizers not working for Map control? #20027
  • Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.After.targets" was not found error coming while building the .net MAUI windows targeted application. #20057
  • @samhouts How/When can we expect this fix in a upcoming update? Ive build my app with the latest version of MAUI 8.0.3 on VS2022 Preview. But i still have the borders on android. #20214
  • On iOS Launcher.OpenAsync presents Open-In/ShareSheet Menu but closes immediately (.net MAUI) #15216
    Backlog
  • FontManager tests using method unavailable in Android API 21 #5684
    Backlog
  • Reproducible Crash iOS AOT GlobalizationNative_LoadICUData #20197
  • [Android] Secondary ToolbarItem Icon Color not correct #20070

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Resolve issues with ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly tests #20224
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [Windows] Resolve issues with the Switch Track Color tests #20221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-reenable

Merged

  • Use fixed version for apiscan #20226
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #20222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20223
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20230
  • Revert "[net9.0] Merge main to net9.0" #20229
  • [iOS][NativeAOT] Adding NativeAOT RunOniOS device test #19923
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing, .NET 9 Planning
  • Adding Mobile tag to MAUI project templates #20191
    area/templates 📄
  • Add comments to internal methods for XAML Hot Reload usage #20215
    area/tooling ⚙️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ci] Add missing demands #20183
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    community ✨, area/keyboard
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20158
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [iOS] Fixed Collection View header and footer update #20210

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When explicitly loading a many-to-many navigation, owned types are re-loaded for the source side #32956
  • Update object value by with key #32955
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: 'Argument data type NULL is invalid for argument 2 of JSON_VALUE function.' #32952
  • CVE-2024-0056 Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and System.Data.SqlClient SQL Data Provider Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #32950

Closed

  • Performance Degradation with Async method and nvarchar(max) column #32948
  • AlterColumnOperation_with_identity_legacy fails consistency after commit to support resetting Identity #32946
    9.0.0
  • Copied entity with navigation properties causes duplication of navigation entities #32904

PullRequests

Created

  • Split SQL Server functional tests into two projects #32953

Merged

  • Fix failing test related to SQL Server identity reseeding #32949
  • Fix copy paste typo #32951
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Stop specifying incorrect column name in snapshot for owned type of generic entity type #32937
  • [release/8.0] Throw for empty strings in primitive collection columns #32928
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Don't assume that FK of skip navigation is non-null #32925
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian11 only, SDK dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-alpha.1.24070.3.deb installing failed with error: archive 'aspnetcore-runtime/aspnetcore-targeting-pack-9.0.0-alpha.1.24068.16-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #18314

PullRequests

Created

  • Use multiple processes for license scan #18448

Merged

  • Update SDK diff baseline #18446
  • [main] Allow CC 4.0 license #18444
  • [main] Update SB poison baseline #18443
  • Allow CC 4.0 license #18442
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18417

Updated

  • [NO MERGE] Installer (Merge to SDK) - Changeset #17959
    DO NOT MERGE
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Move aspire to toolset #18430
